How to apply?
  • Install Waves Keeper and create a Waves wallet
  • Ask for DAO invitation and fees sponsorship
  • Sign up on DAO and fill the submit your project
  • Promote your idea and invite more reviewers
  • Receive a grant or crowdfunding support
  • Submit and track your dApp on dAppOcean
  • Scale your web3 startup

Are you an expert in web3 technology or marketing?
Would you like to make predictions about which projects are promising and worth to support?
Earn rewards from projects or recommendation bonuses from the Waves Incubator

  • Be rewarded 🎁 
    by the project

    in incubation and VC funding

  • Be rewarded 🏆 
    by the Incubator

    for grant recommendations

    Up to 150% of your contribution when the project receives a grant

  • Be rewarded 🎉 
    by the DAO

    via Karma and the profit share
How to contribute?
  • Install Waves Keeper and create a Waves wallet
  • Ask for DAO invitation and fees sponsorship
  • Donate for a project you like and leave a review
  • Receive rewards and bonuses
  • Explore more dApps and ideas

Are you an active member of Waves community?
Would you like to educate DAO members, help newcomers or organize events?
Receive support for your activities from the DAO or via the Waves ambassador program:

  • Tech Jedi

    Become a tech Jedi and help with web3 education, workshops and open sourсe advocacy

  • Regional Consul

    Become a Regional Consul and help with business development activities and community growth

  • DAO member

    Become a DAO member and cooperate with others
How to cooperate?
  • Install Waves Keeper and create a Waves wallet
  • Ask for DAO invitation and fees sponsorship
  • Apply for the ambassador program
  • Receive rewards in WRTs, WAVES and WCTs for your activity
  • Help Waves community grow and prosper
